scenes.description: Nanashi Mumei stands on a glowing stage, looking out at the audience before a transition to a montage.
Performance of 'Departures ～あなたにおくるアイの歌～' accompanied by a montage of memories with other Hololive members.
scenes.song_name: Departures ～あなたにおくるアイの歌～

scenes.description: Performance of the original song 'mumei' on the circular stage.

subtitles.original: もうあなたから愛されることも
subtitles.english: Even the fact that I'll no longer be loved by you...

subtitles.original: 必要とされることもない
subtitles.english: ...or be needed by you anymore.

subtitles.original: そして私は
subtitles.english: And so, I am...

subtitles.original: こうして一人ぼっちで
subtitles.english: ...here, all alone.

subtitles.original: あの時あなたは何て言ったの?
subtitles.english: What did you say back then?

subtitles.original: 届かない言葉は宙を舞う
subtitles.english: Unreachable words dance in the air.

subtitles.original: わかってるのに今日もしてしまう
subtitles.english: Even though I know, I end up doing it again today.

subtitles.original: 叶わぬ願いごとを
subtitles.english: Making a wish that won't come true.

subtitles.original: 離さないで ぎゅっと 手を握っていて
subtitles.english: Don't let go, hold my hand tightly.

subtitles.original: あなたと二人 ずっといて
subtitles.english: Stay with me forever, just the two of us.

subtitles.original: 繋いだその手は温かくて
subtitles.english: The hand I held was so warm...

subtitles.original: 優しかった
subtitles.english: ...and kind.

subtitles.original: あなたはいつもそうやって私を
subtitles.english: You always used to tease me like that...

subtitles.original: 怒らせて最後は泣かすんだ
subtitles.english: ...and make me cry in the end.

subtitles.original: だけど後になってごめんねと言う
subtitles.english: But then you'd come later and say "sorry."

subtitles.original: その顔 好きだった
subtitles.english: I loved that face of yours.

subtitles.original: 離さないで ぎゅっと そう思い切り
subtitles.english: Don't let go, hold me tight with all your might.

subtitles.original: あなたの腕の中にいたい
subtitles.english: I want to be in your arms.

subtitles.original: 二人でおでこを合わせながら
subtitles.english: While we touch our foreheads together...

subtitles.original: 眠るの
subtitles.english: ...we fall asleep.

subtitles.original: もう二度と会えないってことを
subtitles.english: The fact that we'll never meet again...

subtitles.original: 知ってたの?
subtitles.english: ...did you know it?

subtitles.original: 離さないで ぎゅっと あなたが好き
subtitles.english: Don't let go, hold me tight, I love you.

subtitles.original: もう一度だって笑ってくれないの?
subtitles.english: Won't you smile for me just once more?

subtitles.original: あなたの温もりが消えちゃう前に
subtitles.english: Before your warmth disappears...

subtitles.original: 抱きしめて
subtitles.english: ...hold me.

subtitles.original: 忘れてしまった
subtitles.english: I have forgotten...

subtitles.original: ことも 言葉 時を求めている
subtitles.english: ...those things, seeking words and time.
